whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagram: What is the {assetSymbol} symbol analysis chart?
whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagramInfo: What does stock chart analysis show?
whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagramDescription: GoldHub collects all analyst messages from social networks such as Telegram channels, Rahavard and Sahamyab websites, and based on AI algorithms identifies the number of buy and sell signals for each stock, and finally shows the summary of social network analysts' opinions in the form of this chart.
whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagramTitle2: How does this chart's needle determine stock buy and sell timing?
whatIsAssetAnalysisDiagramDescription2: If the chart needle points to buy, it means from the analysts' perspective it's time to buy this stock, and if it points to sell, it means you should consider selling and taking profit. If the needle is in the neutral zone, the stock is volatile and it's not the right time to buy or sell yet.
faqQuestion1: What does stock chart analysis show?
faqAnswer1: GoldHub collects all analyst messages from social networks such as Telegram channels, Rahavard and Sahamyab websites, and based on AI algorithms identifies the number of buy and sell signals for each stock, and finally shows the summary of social network analysts' opinions in the form of this chart.
faqQuestion2: How does this chart's needle determine stock buy and sell timing?
faqAnswer2: If the chart needle points to buy, it means from the analysts' perspective it's time to buy this stock, and if it points to sell, it means you should consider selling and taking profit. If the needle is in the neutral zone, the stock is volatile and it's not the right time to buy or sell yet.

n1.title: What is GoldHub and what does it do?
n1.text: GoldHub analyzes signals from 34,000 stock and cryptocurrency traders every day and introduces you to the top traders in financial markets so you can follow them and have more profitable trades using these people's analysis!

n2.title: How can I find top traders with the highest rank?
n2.text: Top traders are listed on the relevant page and you can see each trader's rank next to them. Also, if you search for your trader's name on GoldHub, you can enter that person's dedicated page and see that trader's track record with all details.

n3.title: How are GoldHub featured symbols generated?
n3.text: Top traders are listed on the relevant page and featured symbols are suggested based on the summary of top traders' signals. These are symbols that top-ranked individuals have issued the most buy signals for in recent days.

n4.title: Is there a fee to use GoldHub?
n4.text: Part of GoldHub's services is free for all users. But if you want to use the featured symbols section or want to be informed in time of top traders' latest decisions about your stocks, you need to have GoldHub subscription.

n5.title: How can I test GoldHub product before purchasing subscription?
n5.text: GoldHub has provided a free gift plan for all users so you can test the product before purchasing and if our product is valuable to you, proceed with purchase.

n6.title: How do I receive the gift plan?
n6.text: No extra work is needed to use GoldHub gift subscription. To use GoldHub gift, just register on GoldHub website and we'll activate the GoldHub gift for you right away.

n7.title: Is there a difference between bronze, silver and gold plans?
n7.text: All GoldHub plans are similar in terms of features and their only difference is in usage duration. Of course, we've considered special discounts for those who purchase silver and gold plans!

n8.title: Can I cancel my membership whenever I want?
n8.text: There's no option to cancel membership in GoldHub mid-plan. But you can change your plan up or down for your future purchases.

n9.title: Can I use a discount code to join GoldHub?
n9.text: We do have discount codes. If you'd like to use a discount code, contact our support to get a discount code. Just enter the discount code you received from us or anywhere else in the relevant section and

n10.title: How do we know when it's time to sell or buy a stock?
n10.text: There's usually no exact time to buy and sell a stock. But on the featured symbols page, we try to introduce symbols that top traders are paying attention to so you can select them. We also inform you of stock status changes from buy to sell according to top traders' signals. Note that if you've received suitable profit (for example above 20 percent) from a stock, it's better to cash out part of it.

n11.title: Can I trust GoldHub signals?
n11.text: GoldHub generates its signals using algorithms based on collective intelligence and we ourselves use these signals for buying and selling. For more confidence, you can follow GoldHub signals for a while and after ensuring performance, proceed with buying and selling based on them. It should be noted that these signals are only analysis and the consequences of buying and selling and decisions are your own responsibility.

n12.title: Does GoldHub give buy or sell alerts?
n12.text: On each stock's page, there's an option to activate the alert system. If you activate the alert system for each stock, you can receive GoldHub alerts for buying and selling.

asset.title: Add market's best to watchlist:

trader.text: Be instantly aware of traders' buy and sell signals.

text.name: GoldHub
text.first: 1- Ranks social media traders like Telegram, Rahavard, TradingView, etc. and introduces you to the best stock and cryptocurrency market traders.
text.second: 2- Instantly notifies you of the best stocks and cryptocurrencies that top traders recommend.

n2.title: What is the featured symbols page?
n2.text: On the featured symbols page, you can see the best stock and cryptocurrency symbols recommended by top financial market traders.

n3.title: If I subscribe, what features will be activated for me?

text.first: 1- Unlimited access to featured symbols page
text.second: 2- Access to top traders page and full view of traders' signals
text.third: 3- Create custom watchlist and receive instant alerts from followed symbols and traders

n4.title: What does GoldHub NOT do?
n4.text: GoldHub has no responsibility for signals that traders give and only collects traders' opinions and doesn't provide additional analysis itself.

aboutPage.title: Connecting Heritage with Modern Commerce
aboutPage.subtitle: Trusted B2B Marketplace for Gold & Jewelry

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: GoldHub bridges the gap between traditional craftsmanship and modern digital commerce. We empower suppliers to reach a global market and retailers to source authentic, high-quality products with confidence.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: Every item listed is verified for quality and origin.

security.title: Security
security.description: State-of-the-art encryption and secure escrow payments.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Fast logistics network ensuring timely delivery.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: At GoldHub, we take your privacy seriously. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a transaction, or contact customer support.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to facilitate transactions, improve our platform, send you updates, and ensure the security of our marketplace.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share information with trusted third-party service providers (e.g., payment processors, logistics partners) only as necessary.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact our support team to exercise these rights.

hero.title: The Smart Way to Order Gold & Gold Artifacts
hero.description: Place wholesale orders for gold and gold artifacts directly from verified suppliers. Transparent pricing, secure transactions, and fast order management.

features.title: Why GoldHub?
features.subtitle: We simplify wholesale gold trading with transparent pricing and fast operations.

noFees.title: Transparent Fees
noFees.description: All fees are clearly defined with no hidden costs. Designed for fair and efficient gold trade.

microSavings.title: Flexible Order Quantities
microSavings.description: Order gold in precise weights, down to milligram-level accuracy, based on your business needs.

secure.title: Secure & Regulated
secure.description: All trades are legal, supervised, and protected with industry-grade security standards.

whatIs.a: GoldHub is a B2B platform for wholesale gold trading, connecting retailers with verified suppliers to place and manage gold and gold artifact orders.

fees.q: What are the trading fees on GoldHub?
fees.a: GoldHub charges a transparent transaction fee applied to wholesale gold trades. All fees are visible before order confirmation.

pricing.q: How are gold prices determined on GoldHub?
pricing.a: Prices are based on real market transactions and high-volume trading data from the Tehran Grand Bazaar.

attributes.q: What are the characteristics of melted gold?
attributes.a: Melted gold is refined from bars, scrap, or second-hand gold and graded by purity. It is widely used as a raw material in jewelry manufacturing and wholesale trade.

karat.a: 18k gold contains 75% pure gold and 25% alloy metals, offering durability and suitability for commercial gold trading.

cta.title: Start Trading Today
cta.description: Registration takes less than one minute. Access verified suppliers and manage wholesale gold orders with ease.
